thread.title: Police searching for man who broke into Richmond gas station
thread.title_full: Police searching for man who broke into Richmond gas station - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Police searching for man who broke into Richmond gas station
text:
Police are on the look out for whoever broke into the Lucky Spot Citgo in Richmond.
The door is off the hinges this morning and police say the man in this photo broke into the basement. It happened at about 1:30 this morning. They say he took cases of cigarettes and rolling wrappers worth about fifteen hundred dollars.
